Name: Club Cocktail (Butt's recipe)
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
15 ml Syrup from Luxardo Maraschino Cherries
22.5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: STIR all ingredients with ice & fine strain into chilled glass.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2002 by Michael Butt at Milk & Honey, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Club Cocktail (Butt's recipe) contains 215 calories
